description: Lead the frontend development team in building a large-scale SaaS platform. Implemented modern frontend architecture, performance optimizations, and accessibility improvements.
Developed interactive data visualization dashboards for enterprise clients. Created reusable chart components and optimized rendering performance.
Built a marketplace platform from the ground up. Developed both frontend and backend components, implemented payment processing, and user authentication.
Graduated with second-class honors. Specialized in web development and distributed systems. Completed a thesis on BLockchain in capital market and Shares.
